profileText: a Representative from California; born in Rocklin, Sacramento County, Calif., January 30, 1985; graduated from Granite Bay High School, Granite Bay, Calif., 2003; A.B., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2007; J.D., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 2012; M.A., Loyola Marymount University, Los Angeles, Calif., 2009; lawyer, private practice; business owner; adjunct professor; deputy attorney general, Calif. state department of justice, 2015-2016; member of the California state assembly, 2016-2022; unsuccessful candidate for election for Governor of California in 2021; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
